Title: Requires the court to provide a range of dates for a person pleading not guilty to a traffic infraction to appear
Summary: Requires the court to provide a range of at least three different dates and times for a person pleading not guilty to a traffic infraction to appear.
LawCode: Amd ยง1806, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring the court to provide a range of dates for a person pleading not guilty to a traffic infraction to appear
